ABOUT ME

Hello! I have 16 years of experience. 11 years in automation. worked on big & small companies. strong expertise in Golang.

I worked on a variety of big and small companies since the beginning of my studies.

Top Skills: Golang • Linux • Puppet • Kubernetes • Terraform

THINGS ABOUT ME

Learning New Things

What's better than the rush of joy from learning and understanding something new?

Automation

There is nothing more frustrating and annoying than starting the same thing twice: Automation is the best answer.

Development

I love developing modules, plugins, and micro apps regardless of the language like Go, Python or config manager tools like Ansible or Puppet.

WORK HISTORY

Present

Platform Engineer / Automation Consultant Ingenico Group

Dec 2019 - Present Paris

Built and maintain a secure multi-tenant observability stack using Grafana OSS products (Grafana dashboards, Grafana Mimir, Envoy).

Developed and released Terraform Providers for Grafana Mimir (Prometheus metrics) and Loki (logs). Developed and evolved Golang Prometheus exporters. Automated deployment and configuration of telemetry stack (Metrictank, Kafka, Zookeeper, Graphite, Grafana) and monitoring stack (Sensu, Moira).

Upstream GitHub contributions to grafana/agent, grafana/mimir, grafana/terraform-provider-grafana, prometheus/prometheus, and prometheus/alertmanager.

Developed automation tools in Go to enable internal customers to focus on their business.

Automation Consultant Ingenico Group

Mar 2017 - Dec 2019 Paris

Advanced automation and infrastructure self-service initiatives for Dev and R&D teams.

Developed Python tools: f5manager (F5 configuration management), foreman-clush (shell command execution), and itlab (web interface for user creation).

WSO2: Automated deployment and configuration in HA, developed Python microservice for monitoring.

Datalake: Automated deployment and configuration of multiple MapR clusters from LAB to production, handled operational maintenance, upgrades, and scalability. Developed Python tool for Spark application deployment on MapR clusters.
